import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { db } from "../firebase/config"; import { useAuth } from "../firebase/context"; const UserAccount = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [displayName, setDisplayName] = useState(""); const [address, setAddress] = useState(""); const [addressTwo, setAddressTwo] = useState(""); const [city, setCity] = useState(""); const [state, setState] = useState(""); const [zip, setZip] = useState(""); const [loader, setLoader] = useState(""); const { currentUser } = useAuth(); // eslint-disable-next-line const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); const handleUserSumbit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoader(true); }; useEffect(() => { db.collection("users").onSnapshot((snapshot) => setUsers(snapshot.docs.map((doc) => doc.data())) ); }, []); return ( <> {!currentUser &&
User Profile
}
Full Name setDisplayName(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="First & Last" required /> Email setEmail(e.target.value)} type="email" required placeholder="Enter email" /> Password setPassword(e.target.value)} type="password" required placeholder="Password" /> Address setAddress(e.target.value)} placeholder="1234 Main St" required /> Address 2 setAddressTwo(e.target.value)} placeholder="Apartment, studio, or floor #" /> City setCity(e.target.value)} placeholder="San Antonio" required /> State setState(e.target.value)} as="select" defaultValue="Choose..." required > Zip setZip(e.target.value)} placeholder="78205" required />
Payment Information
Name on card Card Number Zip Code Expiration Date Password
); }; export default UserAccount;
